product_name: Nike Zoom Wildhorse Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Nike Zoom Wildhorse Trail-Running Shoes offer lightweight comfort and stability with the feel of a track spike and the aggressive traction of a trail shoe. Zoom Air units in the heels and forefeet to soak up shock and provide a smooth transition to a responsive toe-off. Compression-molded Phylon and Cushlon midsoles offer dual-density cushioning and a responsive ride. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Dynamic Fit technology for adaptive comfort and support. Waffled rubber outsoles stand up to regular wear and provide good traction; lugs are tapered for running hills efficiently. Anatomic heels are rounded to roll with the ground, promoting a natural range of motion. Nike Zoom Wildhorse Trail-Running Shoes have reflective hits that increase your visibility in low light.
short_description: The Nike Zoom Wildhorse Trail-Running Shoes offer lightweight comfort and stability with the feel of a track spike and the aggressive traction of a trail shoe.
